channel.title: Booklists on Mind in the Machine

item.title: Readlist
item.description: Currently reading Thinking, Fast and Slow – Daniel Kahneman Thinking in Systems: A Primer – Donella H. Meadows, Diana Wright A few reads I really enjoyed Scale – Geoffrey West Where Is My Flying Car? – J. Storrs Hall The Future of Humanity – Michio Kaku
